Posted By: ZEvilMustache (7/11/2009 9:35:38 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I literally burst out laughing reading Master of Etherium's comment. Half of me wants to disagree with him, but the other half really likes the idea that Magic players hate real-world animals because they never go outside. Also, this is the only place in the world where a debate on the merits of dryads vs. antelopes could form.  
  
I'm beginning to think Master of Etherium is an Internet character actor - a normal person playing the role of a troll. Every forum I've been on has at least one of those.

posts.post_content:
Excellent... more fuel for the [Gaea's Liege](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gaea's Liege) superstar squadron.
  
   
I like the artwork, and the flavor text is nice. I don't really care that it isn't a Dryad... I've seen a billion of them. Nice to have something different.
  
   
Clearly not an every-deck card, situational.
  
   
2.5/5
